title: Camp WeWow Shark Week Day 1: Scaredy Sharks and The Science of Fear
description:
It's Shark Week at Camp WeWow! Today, we're listening to one of our favorite episodes of Wow in the World, "Scaredy Sharks and The Science of Fear!" This week, we're swimming with crafts, activities, and games for you, so be sure to check back for more tomorrow! Visit tinkercast.com/camp for directions to our daily activities and challenges. You can share your tinkerings and tales with us at tinkercast.com/share and at 1-888-7WOW-WOW for the chance to be featured at the “campfire” this Friday!

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
